name: Compost It
usefood: Fruit peels, vegetable scraps, eggshells, coffee grounds
benefit: Improves soil health, reduces landfill waste

name: Feed Animals
usefood: Leftover grains, fruits, vegetables (no mold or processed food)
fartilizerFor: Indirectly contributes to animal manure, which can fertilize crops
benefit: Reduces food waste and provides nutrition for livestock or pets

name: Use for Cleaning
usefood: Citrus peels, vinegar from spoiled wine or fruit

name: Beauty Treatments
usefood: Avocado skins, banana peels, coffee grounds
fartilizerFor: Can be composted later for use on flowers or herbs

name: Make Natural Dyes
usefood: Onion skins, beet peels, red cabbage
fartilizerFor: Can be composted post-use for use on garden plants
benefit: Eco-friendly fabric or craft dye alternative

name: Garden Pest Control
usefood: Coffee grounds, garlic scraps, chili remnants
fartilizerFor: Vegetables, herbs (by protecting them from pests)
